content.text: Match ends, Barcelona B 3, Almería 3.
Second Half ends, Barcelona B 3, Almería 3.
Attempt saved. Fernando Soriano (Almería) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Aarón Ñíguez.
Foul by Martí Riverola (Barcelona B).
Omar Ramos (Almería) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Rafinha (Barcelona B) left footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Carles Planas.

Attempt missed. Jonatan Soriano (Barcelona B) left footed shot from very close range is too high. Assisted by Gerard Deulofeu.
Substitution, Barcelona B. Carles Planas replaces Cristian Tello.
